name: IDeA Europe Foundation
headAddress: Square du Val de la Cambre 16
goal: Development of social and economic initiatives with the purpose to foster development of emerging countries, with a first implementation in Armenia. Themes considered: economic development (ideation and implementation of investments projects), social development (creation of jobs, development of educational infrastructures...), humanitarian topics (reflection on migration and integration issues).
interests: Culture, Development, Education, Energy, Enlargement, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Humanitarian Aid, Research and Technology
euInitiatives: Neighbourhood policy, Eastern Partnership, EU for Innovation, grant schemes available for Armenia
